(0,): As a system administrator, I want to upload and validate files, so that I can ensure the data is accurate and usable for further processing As a data validator, I want to validate the FABS data, so that I can ensure it meets the required standards and rules
(2,): As a data analyst, I want to derive additional fields from the uploaded submissions, so that I can gain more insights from the data
(1,): As a system administrator, I want to submit FABS data, so that I can store and track it for future reference As a data analyst, I want to load and access FPDS data, so that I can use it for analysis and reporting As a quality assurance specialist, I want to track and manage UI improvements, so that I can identify and prioritize areas for improvement
